price: 38.Too waqdi Nabii Zakariyya Yalli Maryam isi Rizqhik edde konnabisem yuble waqdi, isi Rabbi xaaqeeh Yi-Rabbow isi xaquk meqe Samaday (Raddi) Barkat-le yoh Acuy, Diggah Atu koo xaaqe marih xaaqo yaabbi kinnitok iyye.
arabic: هُنَالِكَ دَعَا زَكَرِيَّا رَبَّهُۥۖ قَالَ رَبِّ هَبۡ لِي مِن لَّدُنكَ ذُرِّيَّةٗ طَيِّبَةًۖ إِنَّكَ سَمِيعُ ٱلدُّعَآءِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: hunālika daʿā zakariyyā rabbahu qāla rabbi hab lī min ladunka dhurriyyatan ṭayyibatan innaka samīʿu al-duʿāi
